messages.message:
Ari Emanuel tonight left no ambiguity of what he thinks about Benjamin Netanyahu.
It is not a time to stay silent,” Emanuel said to the packed Beverly Wilshire ballroom.
This is a painful and crucial moment for all of us who are Jews and who love Israel.
As he said, in the absence of a plan, “only two negative options remain”: Hamas rules Gaza or the Israeli military rules Gaza.
For two decades, he has divided Jews in Israel and around the world to stay in power as long as possible.

It is not a time to stay silent,” Emanuel said to the packed Beverly Wilshire ballroom.
This is a painful and crucial moment for all of us who are Jews and who love Israel.
My connection to Israel goes back to before I was born and even before the state of Israel was founded.
As he said, in the absence of a plan, “only two negative options remain”: Hamas rules Gaza or the Israeli military rules Gaza.
For two decades, he has divided Jews in Israel and around the world to stay in power as long as possible.

Photo Credit: courtesy, Oporto Jewish CommunityThe Oporto Jewish Community has released its latest project on the anniversary of the creation of the Portuguese Inquisition at an event attended by around a thousand Portuguese schoolchildren.
AdvertisementA year after being deported to the islands, only 600 children had survived the conditions and wild animals.
“This dark episode demonstrates the depths that many went to in order to try and defeat and destroy our people,” said Michael Rothwell, the director of the Oporto Jewish Museum which hosted the event.
The schoolchildren were given a tour of the Oporto Jewish Museum and the Holocaust Museum to teach them about the history of Jews in Portugal and the antisemitism that they experienced.
“It is important to show the context of current antisemitism as a continuation of what has gone before.

The Oporto Jewish Community has released its latest project on the anniversary of the creation of the Portuguese Inquisition at an event attended by around a thousand Portuguese schoolchildren.
“This dark episode demonstrates the depths that many went to in order to try and defeat and destroy our people,” said Michael Rothwell, the director of the Oporto Jewish Museum which hosted the event.
“We are once again living in a dark time when the Jewish People are under attack around the world.
The schoolchildren were given a tour of the Oporto Jewish Museum and the Holocaust Museum to teach them about the history of Jews in Portugal and the Antisemitism that they experienced.
It is important to show the context of current Antisemitism as a continuation of what has gone before.

Eight months on, there are still many questions: how do we talk openly and share strong views about Israel and Palestine?
“It’ll be a meeting that’s got nothing to do with what’s going on in Israel, and I’ll be preparing myself for it.
He feels isolated because he refuses to engage in “ignorant” debates about the war that disparage Israel.
Lucky for him, he quips, in Hollywood, “most people have no spine”, and are happy to sidestep talking about Israel and Palestine altogether.
“[The Israeli government’s] threats are so frightening, and what has become of us in our behaviour in Gaza is so frightening.

Eight months on, there are still many questions: how do we talk openly and share strong views about Israel and Palestine?
“It’ll be a meeting that’s got nothing to do with what’s going on in Israel, and I’ll be preparing myself for it.
He feels isolated because he refuses to engage in “ignorant” debates about the war that disparage Israel.
Lucky for him, he quips, in Hollywood, “most people have no spine”, and are happy to sidestep talking about Israel and Palestine altogether.
“[The Israeli government’s] threats are so frightening, and what has become of us in our behaviour in Gaza is so frightening.
